lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The bill, already passed by the House, would enable 1987 winter wheat and feedgrains farmers hit by Midwestern flooding last year to receive at least 92 pct of their federal income support payments even if they did not plant.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Democrats and Republicans today were still trying to arrive at an agreement governing time to be devoted to amendments.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Earlier this year Dole said advancing the final deficiency payments would provide feedgrains producers with approximately three billion dlrs in income payments prior to spring planting instead of in the fall.
